name: This Game Was Generated By An AI
name_original: This Game Was Generated By An AI
description:
My friend and I have struggled for years to create good art for our games, then we discovered an AI tool that lets us generate art out of a text strings. We decided to create a spiritual successor based off of a classic game.

Features:

  •  Art entirely generated by an AI 
  • 4 levels
  • Rebindable controls

Controls:

  • Toggle Full Screen : Escape Key
  • Jump : W Key
  • Move Left : A Key 
  • Move Right : D Key 

Credits:

  • Art by Craiyon ( https://www.craiyon.com/ )
    • Text strings created by Jared and Ian
  • Programming / Level Design by Ian
  • Music by Cyberleaf (Pre-purchased from a Humble Bundle Pack)
